copyright
.
(c) (C)
.
<p>© ©</p>
.


reserved
.
(r) (R)
.
<p>® ®</p>
.


trademark
.
(tm) (TM)
.
<p>™ ™</p>
.


paragraph
.
(p) (P)
.
<p>§ §</p>
.


plus-minus
.
+-5
.
<p>±5</p>
.


ellipsis
.
test.. test... test..... test?..... test!....
.
<p>test… test… test… test?.. test!..</p>
.


dupes
.
!!!!!! ???? ,,
.
<p>!!! ??? ,</p>
.


em-dashes
.
-- remarkable -- super --
.
<p>— remarkable — super —</p>
.
